snippet: The spokesman for the far-right Golden Dawn party who slapped one female politician and threw a glass of water on another last week has sued both women and the television channel that hosted the news show.
abstract: Ilias Kasidiaris, the spokesman for the Greek far-right Golden Dawn party who caused an uproar by assaulting two female politicians, sues the two women as well as the television channel that hosted the news channel on which the assault occurred.
lead_paragraph: The spokesman for the far-right Golden Dawn party who slapped one female politician and threw a glass of water on another last week has sued both women and the television channel that hosted the news show.
